abilities.name: Tunnel Rat
abilities.description: May Step through Vents.

abilities.name: Loyal
abilities.description: To Influence return all cubes on this card and place at least 1 more cube than was previously here.

abilities.name: Live Streams
abilities.description: If Jammers are OFF, Billionaire's and Fletcher's Sections act as if Lit and Cameras are ON.

abilities.name: Rich
abilities.description: Cannot be Bribed. When Activated, you may use a grey Bribe instead of your own. Grey Bribes only score if Billionaire escapes.

abilities.name: Breach
abilities.description: As an Action, may remove an adjacent Lock.

abilities.name: Fugitive
abilities.description: No actions taken with or against this Character will make a player Suspect.

abilities.name: Scientist
abilities.description: May perform a Free Section Action instead of a Free Pick Up or Drop.

abilities.name: ZeroBorn
abilities.description: May Free Step or Airlock into a zero Gravity Section instead of Free Pick Up or Drop.

abilities.name: Officer
abilities.description: If not Blackout, may Step (or if Down, be Dragged) through Locks, which are then removed.

abilities.name: Paranoid
abilities.description: To Influence, the active player must have a Colocated Conspirator. Cannot be Bribed.

abilities.name: Fast Talk
abilities.description: Cannot be Attacked by Humans with Bludgeon in Lit Sections

abilities.name: Mimic Frameup
abilities.description: After Downing a Human in a Lit Section, the active player may choose another player who has a Colocated Conspirator to become Suspect instead.

abilities.name: Vengeful
abilities.description: Using Corpsicle's Kompromat will additionally give her a Bludgeon. Her Kompromat can be used even if Down, which will instantly Revive her if down.

abilities.name: Dying
abilities.description: May not be activated when Exhausted and gets no free Pick Up or Drop when activated.

abilities.name: Wormtongue
abilities.description: As an Action, move a cube on a Colocated Human's card to Betrayal.

abilities.name: Uncanny
abilities.description: It takes two Activation discs for this Character to become Exhausted.

abilities.name: Pride
abilities.description: Cannot be Robbed.

abilities.name: Adrenaline
abilities.description: Is not Downed by Hazards. Step or Airlock into Section with Hazard is always free.

abilities.name: A.I.
abilities.description: Can only perform Console actions. Characters Possessing Digital Assistant have Officer for Section actions and do not require Abandon ship to launch Pod.

abilities.name: Helpful
abilities.description: No player may have more than one influence cube on this Character.

abilities.name: Split
abilities.description: Has two Identity Cards.

abilities.name: Disassemble
abilities.description: As an Action, can Down self to Repair a Colocated Section Robot.

abilities.name: Remote Control
abilities.description: Cannot be Bribed, Influenced, or Activated Directly. As a Console Action Characters may perform an Action with any Live Drone.

abilities.name: Jury Rig
abilities.description: As an action, Repair a Colocated Damaged Section or Down Robot.

abilities.name: Hacker
abilities.description: May perform a Free Console Action instead of a Free Pick Up or Drop. If Jammers are OFF may perform Console Actions in any Section.

abilities.name: Investigator
abilities.description: Can Pick Up Kompromat or Manufacture Data from adjacent Sections.

abilities.name: Badge
abilities.description: May Rob Items as if in possession of a Gun.

abilities.name: Process Server
abilities.description: As an Action, Manufacture NDA into the Possession of all Colocated Humans and Robots.

abilities.name: Lawyer Up
abilities.description: As an Action may change a Colocated Innocent or Guilty PC's status to suspect.

abilities.name: Emergency Response
abilities.description: As an Action, may Revive a Human. Step of Airlock into Sections with Down Human is always Free.

abilities.name: EMP Burst
abilities.description: Damage Operative's Section. Down all Robots in it and Delete all Colocated Data.

abilities.name: Peacekeeper
abilities.description: May only Attack Fugitives, Monsters or non-innocent PCs. May not Sabotage.

abilities.name: Armored
abilities.description: Cannot be Attacked or Robbed by Bludgeon.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Perform an Action with a Colocated Unhelmeted Human, ignoring Self-Preservation. May only perform Telepathy Actions.
